classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, C1, C2, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. D5 and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Two (2) courses must be completed from GE B1. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
